textBox.richText: Thanks to André, Manuel, Laurent and Bastien, the videos (with Synchronized slides) of the short course on BOB with Hands-On is available on YouTube. <HERE> This short course on BOB ( https://github.com/idiap/bob/wiki/Bob-Starter-Course ) is an introductory course on Python, Bob and Scientific Software Management. BOB will be used for the labs of the EPFL course “Fundamentals in Statistical Pattern Recognition” HERE. More information on BOB: • BOB: http://idiap.github.com/bob/
Short course on BOB with Hands-On on YouTube
